Articles.Content:
The Shirt Design!

I created t-shirts featuring the above decal I made, which are available at:

(Just Helmet Design) http://juedeman.spreadshirt.com/space-helmet-t-shirt-A100031960/customize/color/2

(Helmet with Quote on Back) http://juedeman.spreadshirt.com/space-helmet-t-shirt-with-back-quote-A100039436/customize/color/2

What do you guys think of the shirt, price, etc? Should I make more? Is there an audience for this kind of stuff here?

Edited November 1, 2014 by TannerBJ

I love it!

Would suggest a SQUAD and Kerbal Space Program logo, plus a black and white image of the Mun crash scene at startup on the back.

I love it!

Would suggest a SQUAD and Kerbal Space Program logo, plus a black and white image of the Mun crash scene at startup on the back.

Like a how industry shirts have sponsors on the back? Huh, that would be cool! I would need to contact SQUAD to see if using their logo would be acceptable, but I may end up doing that on my shirts in the future!

The logos would also spread the game around more than just the image shown on the front.

Yeah, you should definitely ask SQUAD, because I have no idea if it is entirely legal to do this without the logos... or royalties

No Squad-created art was used to make it, it was all done by hand, and because it doesn't have any logos on it right now, there isn't anything that I can outright see that infringes on SQUAD's creative rights. I'll contact them before I attempt to put their logo on anything though.

No Squad-created art was used to make it, it was all done by hand, and because it doesn't have any logos on it right now, there isn't anything that I can outright see that infringes on SQUAD's creative rights. I'll contact them before I attempt to put their logo on anything though.

Well in that case SQUAD probably has nothing to lose! It would be yet another way to get the public interested in the game.

I would probably get one of these, even more so if the other images were added.

(oooh, could you stick one of those Retro KSP flag/logo things on there? Maybe on the sleeve?)

(oooh, could you stick one of those Retro KSP flag/logo things on there? Maybe on the sleeve?)

http://i.imgur.com/Vt9hiwG.png

That would look pretty nice converted to black and white!
It would look like this, in fact
Or this if you kept the halo?

Ah, yes, that's a lot better.

(My image editing skills are a wee bit rusty. )
T-shirts with stuff on the back are the dad-jokes of clothing.

T-shirts with stuff on the back are the dad-jokes of clothing.

How so?

I love it!

Would suggest a SQUAD and Kerbal Space Program logo

I wouldn't Otherwise, the shirt's fine as is.
epic! I made myself a Zokesia Skunkworks tee shirt a while back....
99% of people who see that will just think I spelled Moon wrong though...

99% of people who see that will just think I spelled Moon wrong though...

But that 1%... They'll know

I wouldn't Otherwise, the shirt's fine as is.

Eh, I'd still like that KSP badge or the Mun crash scene.

Maybe different shirts? That would be cool too.

Eh, I'd still like that KSP badge or the Mun crash scene.

Maybe different shirts? That would be cool too.

If I get enough sales, or even just interest on this first ...., I'll make more. I'll need to come up with more original content though.

Edited November 1, 2014 by TannerBJ
Looks great! Logos would be cool if you could get permission from Squad.
Oh, I really like that. Great design!
Thanks man!

If you earn money using Squad's copyrighted names and images, you're clearly breaking the law, even if the stuff lacks those things. You simply can't call your stuff "KSP shirt". It's pretty straightforward.

https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/eula.php

If you earn money using Squad's copyrighted names and images, you're clearly breaking the law, even if the stuff lacks those things. You simply can't call your stuff "KSP shirt". It's pretty straightforward.

https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/eula.php

It's a KSP fanshirt. The images used aren't copyrighted by Squad, I created them. I'm changing the name of the shirt where it's listed, but I can't do that here as I can't delete my own thread.

It's a KSP fanshirt. The images used aren't copyrighted by Squad, I created them. I'm changing the name of the shirt where it's listed, but I can't do that here as I can't delete my own thread.

I was just pointing out the advertising.

It's a KSP fanshirt. The images used aren't copyrighted by Squad, I created them. I'm changing the name of the shirt where it's listed, but I can't do that here as I can't delete my own thread.

You can change the name of your own thread. Edit the first post, click "Go Advanced" and then you can edit the title.
